sentences.en: Lead can accumulate in the body until toxic levels are reached.
sentences.cn: 铅可以在体内积聚直至到达有毒的程度。

sentences.en: It was his ambition to accumulate a million dollars before he turned thirty.
sentences.cn: 他的雄心是在30岁以前积攒100万美元。

sentences.en: They accumulate essentially no body fat.
sentences.cn: 它们基本上不积累身体脂肪。
